channel.title: Cooking on LGW's Random Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Cooking on LGW's Random Ramblings

item.title: I'm Moroccan these recipes!
item.description: I love cuisines where the spices and aromatics meld into a warm, savory flavor profile, and the textures are just perfect from the combined ingredients. That’s one reason why I’ve become a big fan of recipes styled from African roots.

item.title: Welcome to "What's Cooking?"
item.description: Over the years, I’ve been posting pictures on social media of what I’ve been cooking for me and my family. Friends have paid me many compliments, and have said they’ll miss my posts now that I’m off of social media. That’s why I’m introducing this section of my blog!
